{"data": {"blog": {"q3---recap-and-look-ahead-8nb7p8": {"": "# \\\\u{1f680} Developer Ecosystem Growth\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n### Documentation and Resources\\\\n\\\\n* 13,800 unique visitors to our documentation pages\\\\n\\\\n* 2,700 users conducted 7,700 searches with an 18.91% average click-through rate\\\\n\\\\n* Created or updated 20 key documentation pieces\\\\n\\\\n### [dev.near.org](https://dev.near.org/) Improvements\\\\n\\\\n* 55,000 unique visitors\\\\n\\\\n* New landing page, events page, and embedded documentation\\\\n\\\\n* Added interactive tools for token creation and linkdrops\\\\n\\\\n### Project Creation\\\\n\\\\n* 222 new frontends (1,928 year-to-date)\\\\n\\\\n* 295 new contracts (2,156 year-to-date)\\\\n\\\\n### Tool Adoption\\\\n\\\\n* Significant downloads across our tools:\\\\n\\\\n* near-api-js: 890,000 downloads\\\\n\\\\n* near-sdk-rs: 8,391 downloads\\\\n\\\\n* cargo-near: 3,391 downloads\\\\n\\\\n# \\\\u{1f6e0}\\\\u{fe0f} Enhanced Developer Tools\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n* Improved Ledger integration\\\\n\\\\n* Introduced \\\\\\\"Teach-Me\\\\\\\" mode in CLIs\\\\n\\\\n* Released JavaScript SDK 2.0\\\\n\\\\n* Enhanced Rust tools, including cargo-near CLI improvements\\\\n\\\\n## \\\\u{1f3c1} Race of Sloths: Gamifying Open-Source Contributions\\\\n\\\\nWe\\\\\\'re excited about our new initiative, Race of Sloths, designed to attract developers from outside the NEAR ecosystem. This gamified open-source contribution program allows developers to experience NEAR\\\\\\'s capabilities in an engaging way.\\\\n\\\\nKey achievements so far:\\\\n\\\\n* Approximately 350 Pull Requests\\\\n\\\\n* 50 contributors engaged\\\\n\\\\n* 90 Repositories involved\\\\n\\\\nThe Race of Sloths initiative is proving to be an effective way to introduce new developers to NEAR, fostering community growth and encouraging collaborative development. We\\\\\\'re looking forward to seeing this program expand and bring more innovative contributions to our ecosystem.\\\\n\\\\n# \\\\u{1f91d} Community Engagement\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n### Hackathon Participation\\\\n\\\\n* ETHGlobal Brussels: 12 NEAR submissions\\\\n\\\\n* dAGI House hackathon: 4 NEAR submissions\\\\n\\\\n* ETHGlobal Singapore: 13 NEAR submissions\\\\n\\\\n* REDACTED hackathon: 1055 participants (ongoing)\\\\n\\\\n### Developer Support and Interaction\\\\n\\\\n* Answered 189 questions on NEAR Dev Telegram Channel\\\\n\\\\n* Published 12 newsletters with a 44% average open rate\\\\n\\\\n* Held 5 community calls on various topics (Tooling, Chain Signatures, & AI)\\\\n\\\\n* Increased social media presence, reaching over 347k impressions\\\\n\\\\n### NEPs Progress\\\\n\\\\n* Accepted two major NEPs:\\\\n\\\\n* NEP 509: Stateless Validation for improved scalability\\\\n\\\\n* NEP 518: Web3-Compatible Wallets Support\\\\n\\\\n# Looking Ahead\\\\n\\\\n\\\\nAs we enter Q4, we\\\\\\'re focused on building upon these successes. We aim to further enhance our tools and resources, expand initiatives like Race of Sloths, and continue fostering a vibrant developer community.\\\\n\\\\nThank you to all the developers, contributors, and community members who have been instrumental in our growth. We\\\\\\'re excited about the future of NEAR and the innovations yet to come.", "metadata": {"title": "Q3 - Recap and Look Ahead", "author": "thomasguntenaar.near", "status": "DRAFT", "category": "news", "subtitle": "Q3  Recap and Look Ahead - Devhub", "createdAt": "2024-10-08", "updatedAt": "2024-10-08", "description": "Q3  Recap and Look Ahead - Devhub", "publishedAt": "2024-10-08", "communityAddonId": "blogv2"}}}}, "handle": "developer-dao"}

{"body": {"name": "DevHub Developer Contributor report by Yurtur for 09/01/2024 \\\\u{2013} 09/30/2024", "summary": "The main focus was finishing the 0.25 release and rollout of the new 0.26 release.\\\\nAlso, I have fixed wasmer issue for macos and improved near-api-rs.", "category": "Tooling & Infrastructure", "timeline": {"status": "DRAFT"}, "supervisor": "frol.near", "description": "Total Hours: 50.00\\\\nHourly rate: $75/h\\\\nTotal: 3750 USD\\\\n\\\\n##### Release and Updates\\\\n\\\\n###### near-workspaces\\\\n* [#375](https://github.com/near/near-workspaces-rs/pull/375) - updated near-* dependencies to 0.25 release\\\\n* [#377](https://github.com/near/near-workspaces-rs/pull/377) - updates near-* dependencies to 0.26 release\\\\n\\\\n###### near-sdk-rs\\\\n* [#1242](https://github.com/near/near-sdk-rs/pull/1242) - updated near-* dependencies to 0.25 release\\\\n* [#1244](https://github.com/near/near-sdk-rs/pull/1244) - updated near-* dependencies to 0.26 release, migrated testing blockchain to C-unwind\\\\n* [#1246](https://github.com/near/near-sdk-rs/pull/1246) - updated near-workspaces to 0.14 version (matching 0.26 near release)\\\\n\\\\n###### cargo-near\\\\n* [#215](https://github.com/near/cargo-near/pull/215) - updated near-* dependencies to 0.25 release, nead-sdk to 5.4\\\\n* [#220](https://github.com/near/cargo-near/pull/220) - updated near-* dependencies to 0.26 release\\\\n\\\\n###### near-jsonrpc-client\\\\n* [#157](https://github.com/near/near-jsonrpc-client-rs/pull/157) - updated near-* dependencies to 0.26 release\\\\n\\\\n###### near-cli-rs\\\\n* [#403](https://github.com/near/near-cli-rs/pull/403) - bugfix: opening ledger app before calling other methods\\\\n* [#405](https://github.com/near/near-cli-rs/pull/405) - updated near-* dependencies to 0.26 release\\\\n\\\\n###### near-socialdb-client\\\\n* [#21](https://github.com/bos-cli-rs/near-socialdb-client-rs/pull/21) - updated near-* dependencies to 0.26 release\\\\n\\\\n###### bos-cli-rs\\\\n* [#102](https://github.com/bos-cli-rs/bos-cli-rs/pull/102) - updated near-* dependencies to 0.26 release\\\\n\\\\n###### nearcore\\\\n* [#12062](https://github.com/near/nearcore/issues/12062) - investigated and resolved wasmer issue for sandbox that prevented user from interacting with the smart contracts. The issue took a while to resolve and requiered binary search to find the commit that introduced the issue. As well as debugging and resolving a wasmer issue. Even though the fix was trivial, it took a while to find. (https://github.com/near/near-workspaces-rs/pull/376) were used to test the issue.\\\\n\\\\n##### near-api-rs\\\\n* Added key-pooling support and nonce caching to prevent transaction failures\\\\n* Made ledger call asynchronous\\\\n* Updated near-*dependencies to 0.26 release\\\\n* Added CI and Windows compilation check\\\\n* Added storage deposit handling for FT transafers\\\\n\\\\n##### near-sandbox\\\\n* Yanked near-sandbox-utils 0.10.1 as it was causing issue for Mac users\\\\n\\\\n##### Non direct time consumption\\\\n* Discussion and syncing, near-api discussions, code review\\\\n", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "yurtur.near", "requested_sponsor": "neardevdao.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "3750", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDC"}, "labels": [], "accepted_terms_and_conditions_version": 129930980}
